name: Burg_441
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues base with Island Creole influence
strong ritual etiquette around reagent handling
diet heavy on salted fish, seaweed, fermented shell
tide-linked festivals honoring ancestors and safe passage
constraints: no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
notes: holds minor navigational hazard points used by local pilots
